DialogueDictionary.NEW_HORIZONS_WARP_DRIVE_DIALOGUE_1: Your ship is now equiped with a warp drive!
DialogueDictionary.NEW_HORIZONS_WARP_DRIVE_DIALOGUE_2: You can use the new "Interstellar Mode" page in the ship log to lock-on your autopilot to another star system.
DialogueDictionary.NEW_HORIZONS_WARP_DRIVE_DIALOGUE_3: Then just buckle up and engage the autopilot to warp there!
